Reality altering - already explained in first chapter, you are seen as who your wearing.
Transfermation process speed- essentially makes the process of the skinsuit to go what ever speed you want it.
Full skinsuit- instead of the skinsuit only being neck down it's the full person.
Body part removal- essentially your can take apart the skinsuit and wear what you want from it toggle able.
Memory echo- essentially you gain the persons memories which le wearing the skinsuit.
Posession- allows you to possess the person instead of Turn them into a skinsuit.
Body autopilot-works in tandum with posession mode.
Multiple posession- allows you to possess more than one person at a time.
Clone mind- sends a clone of yourself into targets body.
Age progression and depression- changes the ages of targets.
mask maker-turns people.
Puppet- turns skinsuit into a persons normal self exactly their soulless and do what you want them to do.
